title: A glimpse into network availability
description: A simple yet effective approach to network monitoring

title: CSS Animations as a DOM-Based Animations Framework
Database Schema Migration Tools: Flyway & Liquibase + CockroachDB
description: If you use a database, at some point you’ll need to modify your schema design. Maybe you need to store new kinds of information. Perhaps you’ll add a field to a table or even need to change a primary key. Regardless of the reason, application requirements tend to change over time - and you’ll need to migrate. We know how important schema modification is, which is why we’ve built online schema changes and online primary key changes into CockroachDB.

title: Fine-Grained Authorization with Apache Kudu and Apache Ranger
Introducing Versioning in a Content Management System
Self Assessment Framework: How we use Miro for career progression and prepare for effective 121’s
description: We’ve all been there, your yearly review is looming with your manager and you feel somewhat unprepared. You feel that you’ve had a professionally impactful year and you feel quite pleased with what you’ve achieved, but how on earth do you convey all of that?

title: Updating Kubernetes CA certificates the hard way
Welcome to Navigators: DigitalOcean’s Ambassador Program
description: It’s a new year but the DigitalOcean team remains set on fulfilling the same mission guided by the same set of values that has always driven us: to simplify cloud computing so developers and businesses can spend more time creating software that changes the world. The way we deliver on this mission is by starting with community and simplicity and ending with love.

title: Women & STEM: what are we doing to close the gender gap
Your Engineering Leadership Journey in a Nutshell
description: Before we start: despite my best efforts, this text contains many so-called male default terms, like leader, officer, or manager, which although they are generally believed to be gender-neutral, are considered by most men and sadly also the majority of women as male.
